ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] You gain experience!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Congratulations! I was actually almost a full bubble into 50, ran into a very difficult Fear break-in, and had two corpses go unressed. Since then, I ve
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 3 Apr 2000, Sylly Songsynger wrote:
>
> You raise a level! Welcome to level 50!

Congratulations!

I was actually almost a full bubble into 50, ran into a very
difficult Fear break-in, and had two corpses go unressed.
Since then, I've been bouncing between 49 and 50 every time
I've died and been ressed, which has been like 15 times the
last week.

> Augmentation <g>. Cant remember where I heard the great
> tip, but if possible get a level 16 Enchanter to buff you
> <g> (sorry John(tm) just kidding!) one less button to
> mash really helps shorten your fights. I was finding some

You have a belt of concordance, don't you? I got mine last
night and got some very interesting test results that would
make getting an enchanter speedup a tremendously helpful
strategy.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
